H0.text: Which detective is the protagonist of the novels "Dead Man's Folly", "Cards on the Table" and "Mrs McGinty's Dead"?". Sherlock Holmes

H1.text: Which detective is the protagonist of the novels "Dead Man's Folly", "Cards on the Table" and "Mrs McGinty's Dead"?". Miss Marple

H2.text: Which detective is the protagonist of the novels "Dead Man's Folly", "Cards on the Table" and "Mrs McGinty's Dead"?". Inspector Morse

H3.text: Which detective is the protagonist of the novels "Dead Man's Folly", "Cards on the Table" and "Mrs McGinty's Dead"?". Poirot
